name: Darrin Bohn
description: I’m an adventurous, outgoing and funny man who is currently looking for that matured lady who i can relate with on the same level and connect with, make something solid and lasting that could maybe lead to something more permanent. i lost my wife some 11 years ago and she left me with the most wonderful set of twins ever. i’m really looking forward to meeting that one person i’ll spend the rest of my life with doing every fun we’ve ever wanted to and then some.
